TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit SecurityToken extends System.Object

summary.span: 表示用于实现所有安全令牌的基类。

span.span: Represents a base class used to implement all security tokens.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用安全令牌可提供身份验证凭据，也可以保护消息。Use a security token to provide authentication credentials or to protect a message. 安全令牌可以使用以提供身份验证凭据，加密的密钥材料，或者，在安全令牌的情况下颁发安全令牌服务 (STS) 的使用者有关的声明的集合。A security token can be used to provide authentication credentials, cryptographic key material, or, in the case of a security token issued by a security token service (STS), a collection of claims about a subject. 所有安全令牌都派生自类。All security tokens derive from the class. 从.NET 4.5 开始，Windows Identity Foundation (WIF) 完全集成到.NET Framework 中并由 WIF 公开的类处理在代码中的安全令牌的首选的方法。Beginning with .NET 4.5, Windows Identity Foundation (WIF) has been fully integrated into the .NET Framework and the classes exposed by WIF are the preferred method of handling security tokens in your code. Wif，安全令牌序列化和反序列化和从其 XML 表示形式是否验证和使用派生自的类基类。In WIF, security tokens are serialized and deserialized to and from their XML representation and are validated by using classes derived from the base class. 验证令牌时涉及不只确保令牌有效，但还返回从可以在进行身份验证和授权决策中使用的令牌的实例。Validating a token involves not just ensuring that the token is valid, but also returning a instance from the token that can be used in making authentication and authorization decisions. 由标记处理程序的实现构造从令牌为很好地从是固有的令牌的声明类型本身中包含的声明的方法。The is constructed by the token handler’s implementation of the method from the claims contained in the token as well as from claims that are intrinsic to the token type itself. WIF 附带了对以下类型的安全令牌的支持：WIF ships with support for the following types of security tokens: - ： 表示基于 SAML 2.0 断言的安全令牌。: Represents a security token that is based upon a SAML 2.0 Assertion. 通常由安全令牌服务以响应 WS 信任或 WS 联合身份验证安全令牌请求 (RST) 颁发此令牌的类型。This token type is typically issued by a security token service in response to a WS-Trust or WS-Federation security token request (RST). - ： 表示基于 SAML 1.1 断言的安全令牌。: Represents a security token that is based upon a SAML 1.1 Assertion. 通常由安全令牌服务以响应 WS 信任或 WS 联合身份验证安全令牌请求 (RST) 颁发此令牌的类型。This token type is typically issued by a security token service in response to a WS-Trust or WS-Federation security token request (RST). - 和： 表示基于 Kerberos 票证接收或发送 SOAP 消息中的安全令牌 and : Represents a security token that is based upon a Kerberos ticket that is received or sent in a SOAP message - ： 表示基于使用 RSA 算法创建的密钥的安全令牌。: Represents a security token that is based upon key that is created using the RSA algorithm. - ： 表示包含有关会话的信息的安全令牌。: Represents a security token that contains information about a session. - ： 表示基于用户名和密码的安全令牌。: Represents a security token that is based on a username and password. - ： 表示基于 Windows 域或用户帐户的标识的安全令牌。: Represents a security token that is based on the identity of a Windows domain or user account. - ： 表示基于 X.509 证书的安全令牌。: Represents a security token that is based on an X.509 certificate. - ： 表示基于 X.509 证书映射到 Windows 域用户或本地计算机用户帐户的安全令牌。: Represents a security token that is based upon an X.509 certificate that is mapped to a Windows domain user or local computer user account. 两个其他安全令牌类，和，可以使用以帮助处理常规用例。Two other security token classes, and , can be used to help handle general cases. 概括地说的安全令牌分为三个主要类别：Broadly speaking security tokens fall into three major categories: - 令牌携带或引用加密密钥材料。Tokens that carry or reference cryptographic key material. 例如和类型通常用于此目的。For example the and types are often used for this purpose. - 表示的已经过身份验证的用户凭据的令牌。Tokens that represent credentials for users that have already been authenticated. 例如， ， ，并且，如果使用证书身份验证是用户类型。For example, the , , and, in the case of a user authenticated using a certificate, the types. - 在使用 WS 信任或 WS 联合身份验证协议的安全令牌请求的响应由安全令牌服务 (STS) 颁发的令牌。Tokens that are issued by a security token service (STS) in response to a security token request using either the WS-Trust or WS-Federation protocol. 这些通常返回在`wst:RequestSecurityTokenResponse`XML 片段。These are typically returned in a `wst:RequestSecurityTokenResponse` XML fragment. 和类型通常用于表示这些标记。The and types are most often used to represent these tokens. 一种特殊的令牌类型， ，包含在主动或被动方案中使用会话时重新创建主体所需信息。A special token type, the , contains information necessary to recreate a principal when using sessions in active or passive scenarios. 若要将功能添加到现有的令牌类型可以从特定的类型和其关联的令牌处理程序，以支持你将添加到标记的任何新元素派生。To add functionality to existing token types you can derive from the specific type and its associated token handler to support any new elements that you add to the token. 若要添加新的令牌类型的支持，你可以直接从派生类。To add support for new token types, you can derive directly from the class. 执行此操作时，将需要创建令牌处理程序类派生自类。When you do this, you will also need to create a token handler class by deriving from the class. 根据你的令牌的方式使用，你可能还需要通过从派生创建自定义令牌解析程序通过从派生类也作为一个或多个自定义的密钥标识符子句类型类。Depending on how your token is to be used, you may also need to create a custom token resolver by deriving from the class as well as one or more custom key identifier clause types by deriving from the class. ## Examples 在中使用的代码示例主题，将从`Custom Token`示例。The code examples that are used in the topics are taken from the `Custom Token` sample. 此示例提供使处理的简单 Web 令牌 (SWT) 的自定义类。This sample provides custom classes that enable processing of Simple Web Tokens (SWT). 它包含的一个实现`SimpleWebToken`类和一个`SimpleWebTokenHandler`类，以及其他支持 SWT 令牌的类。It includes an implementation of a `SimpleWebToken` class and a `SimpleWebTokenHandler` class, as well as other classes that support SWT tokens. 有关此示例，并提供其他示例的 WIF 和有关从哪里下载它们，请参阅[WIF 代码示例索引](~/docs/framework/security/wif-code-sample-index.md)。For information about this sample and other samples available for WIF and about where to download them, see [WIF Code Sample Index](~/docs/framework/security/wif-code-sample-index.md). 下面的代码演示如何实现`SimpleWebToken`类。The following code shows the implementation of the `SimpleWebToken` class. 此类扩展。This class extends . [!code-csharp[WifCustomTokenST#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Misc/wifcustomtokenst/cs/simplewebtoken/simplewebtokenconstants.cs#1)] [!code-csharp[WifCustomTokenST#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Misc/wifcustomtokenst/cs/simplewebtoken/simplewebtoken.cs#2)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 方法可确定安全令牌能否创建特定密钥标识符。Use the method to determine whether a security token can create a specific key identifier. 若要创建密钥标识符，请调用 方法。To create the key identifier call the method. 默认实现支持的类型的密钥标识符子句。The default implementation supports key identifier clauses of type .

summary.span: 获取安全令牌的唯一标识符。

span.span: Gets a unique identifier of the security token.

value.span: 安全令牌的唯一标识符。

span.span: The unique identifier of the security token.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 通常，当安全令牌序列化为 XML 时，安全令牌的 `Id` 属性 (Attribute) 设置为 属性 (Property) 的值。Typically, when a security token is serialized into XML, the `Id` attribute for the security token is set to the value of the property. ## Examples 在中使用的代码示例主题，将从`Custom Token`示例。The code examples that are used in the topics are taken from the `Custom Token` sample. 此示例提供使处理的简单 Web 令牌 (SWT) 的自定义类。This sample provides custom classes that enable processing of Simple Web Tokens (SWT). 它包含的一个实现`SimpleWebToken`类和一个`SimpleWebTokenHandler`类，以及其他支持 SWT 令牌的类。It includes an implementation of a `SimpleWebToken` class and a `SimpleWebTokenHandler` class, as well as other classes that support SWT tokens. 有关此示例，并提供其他示例的 WIF 和有关从哪里下载它们，请参阅[WIF 代码示例索引](~/docs/framework/security/wif-code-sample-index.md)。For information about this sample and other samples available for WIF and about where to download them, see [WIF Code Sample Index](~/docs/framework/security/wif-code-sample-index.md). 下面的代码演示的替代属性。The following code shows the override of the property. [!code-csharp[WifCustomTokenST#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Misc/wifcustomtokenst/cs/simplewebtoken/simplewebtokenconstants.cs#1)] [!code-csharp[WifCustomTokenST#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Misc/wifcustomtokenst/cs/simplewebtoken/simplewebtoken.cs#3)] [!code-csharp[WifCustomTokenST#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Misc/wifcustomtokenst/cs/simplewebtoken/simplewebtoken.cs#4)]

A that represents the key.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法调用 可首先确定指定的密钥标识符子句是否与此实例相同。The method calls the to first determine whether the specified key identifier clause is the same as this instance. 默认实现返回的第一个元素集合如果集合不为空并且返回`true`; 否则为它将返回`null`。The default implementation returns the first element of the collection if the collection is not empty and if returns `true`; otherwise, it returns `null`.

span.span: An exception should not be thrown from the method.

summary.span: 获取与安全令牌相关联的加密密钥。

span.span: Gets the cryptographic keys associated with the security token.

value.span: 一个类型为 的 ，包含与安全令牌相关联的密钥集。

span.span: A of type that contains the set of keys associated with the security token.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用属性来设置此安全令牌来保护令牌或 SOAP 消息的加密密钥。Use the property to set the cryptographic keys for this security token to protect tokens or a SOAP message. 密钥可以用于，除了别的之外进行数字签名或加密令牌或 SOAP 消息。The keys can be used, among other things, to digitally sign or encrypt either tokens or SOAP messages. ## Examples 在中使用的代码示例主题，将从`Custom Token`示例。The code examples that are used in the topics are taken from the `Custom Token` sample. 此示例提供使处理的简单 Web 令牌 (SWT) 的自定义类。This sample provides custom classes that enable processing of Simple Web Tokens (SWT). 它包含的一个实现`SimpleWebToken`类和一个`SimpleWebTokenHandler`类，以及其他支持 SWT 令牌的类。It includes an implementation of a `SimpleWebToken` class and a `SimpleWebTokenHandler` class, as well as other classes that support SWT tokens. 有关此示例，并提供其他示例的 WIF 和有关从哪里下载它们，请参阅[WIF 代码示例索引](~/docs/framework/security/wif-code-sample-index.md)。For information about this sample and other samples available for WIF and about where to download them, see [WIF Code Sample Index](~/docs/framework/security/wif-code-sample-index.md). 下面的代码演示的替代属性。The following code shows the override of the property. [!code-csharp[WifCustomTokenST#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Misc/wifcustomtokenst/cs/simplewebtoken/simplewebtokenconstants.cs#1)] [!code-csharp[WifCustomTokenST#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Misc/wifcustomtokenst/cs/simplewebtoken/simplewebtoken.cs#3)] [!code-csharp[WifCustomTokenST#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Misc/wifcustomtokenst/cs/simplewebtoken/simplewebtoken.cs#5)]

value.span: 一个 ，表示此安全令牌有效的最初时刻。

span.span: A that represents the instant in time at which this security token is first valid.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 和 属性可确定 令牌有效的时间段。Use the and properties to determine the time period in which a token is valid. 和 属性分别表示此安全令牌有效的最初时刻和最后时刻。The and properties represent the first and last instants in time in which the security token is valid, respectively. ## Examples 在中使用的代码示例主题，将从`Custom Token`示例。The code examples that are used in the topics are taken from the `Custom Token` sample. 此示例提供使处理的简单 Web 令牌 (SWT) 的自定义类。This sample provides custom classes that enable processing of Simple Web Tokens (SWT). 它包含的一个实现`SimpleWebToken`类和一个`SimpleWebTokenHandler`类，以及其他支持 SWT 令牌的类。It includes an implementation of a `SimpleWebToken` class and a `SimpleWebTokenHandler` class, as well as other classes that support SWT tokens. 有关此示例，并提供其他示例的 WIF 和有关从哪里下载它们，请参阅[WIF 代码示例索引](~/docs/framework/security/wif-code-sample-index.md)。For information about this sample and other samples available for WIF and about where to download them, see [WIF Code Sample Index](~/docs/framework/security/wif-code-sample-index.md). 下面的代码演示的替代属性。The following code shows the override of the property. [!code-csharp[WifCustomTokenST#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Misc/wifcustomtokenst/cs/simplewebtoken/simplewebtokenconstants.cs#1)] [!code-csharp[WifCustomTokenST#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Misc/wifcustomtokenst/cs/simplewebtoken/simplewebtoken.cs#3)] [!code-csharp[WifCustomTokenST#6](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Misc/wifcustomtokenst/cs/simplewebtoken/simplewebtoken.cs#6)] [!code-csharp[WifCustomTokenST#8](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Misc/wifcustomtokenst/cs/simplewebtoken/simplewebtoken.cs#8)]
